description: Draike is a straight boy and his friend, Kinsey is a gay boy. They have been friends since freshman year. Draike was always cool with his gay friend and, at times, wondered what it was like to be with a dude. Kinsey, on the other hand, only, EVER thought about his friend, Draike and what it would be like to be plowed by him. So on a rainy day when they were stuck inside, Kinsey went for it, and, to his surprise, Draike went for it. Watch a bored, straight boy fuck a gay dude, just to pass the time.
title: My Boyfriend
